variables.name: INTERNAL_CONTENT_URI
variables.comment: * The content:// style URI for the internal storage.

variables.name: EXTERNAL_CONTENT_URI
variables.comment:
* The content:// style URI for the "primary" external storage
             * volume.

variables.name: CONTENT_TYPE
variables.comment: * The MIME type for this table.

variables.name: ENTRY_CONTENT_TYPE
variables.comment: * The MIME type for an audio track.

variables.name: DEFAULT_SORT_ORDER
variables.comment: * The default sort order for this table

variables.name: RECORD_SOUND_ACTION
variables.comment:
* Activity Action: Start SoundRecorder application. *

Input: nothing. *

Output: An uri to the recorded sound stored in the Media Library * if the recording was successful. * May also contain the extra EXTRA_MAX_BYTES. * @see #EXTRA_MAX_BYTES

variables.name: EXTRA_MAX_BYTES
variables.comment:
* The name of the Intent-extra used to define a maximum file size for
             * a recording made by the SoundRecorder application.
             *
             * @see #RECORD_SOUND_ACTION

methods.name: public static Uri getContentUri(String volumeName)
methods.comment:
* Get the content:// style URI for the audio media table on the
             * given volume.
             *
             * @param volumeName the name of the volume to get the URI for
             * @return the URI to the audio media table on the given volume

methods.name: public static Uri getContentUri(@NonNull String volumeName, long id)
methods.comment:
* Get the content:// style URI for a single row in the audio table
             * on the given volume.
             *
             * @param volumeName the name of the volume to get the URI for
             * @param id the audio to get the URI for
             * @return the URI to the audio table on the given volume

methods.name: public static Uri getContentUriForPath(@NonNull String path)
methods.comment:
* Get the content:// style URI for the given audio media file.
             *
             * @deprecated Apps may not have filesystem permissions to directly
             *             access this path.

methodNames: public static Uri getContentUri(@NonNull String volumeName, long id)
public static Uri getContentUriForPath(@NonNull String path)
